articles.title: EU announces fresh 'Odette', coronavirus aid for PH - pna.gov.ph
articles.description: MANILA – The European Commission is allocating 21 million euros (approximately PHP1.19 billion) to support communities affected by disasters, conflicts, and the pandemic in some Asian nations, including the Philippines, the European Delegation in M…
articles.content: TOPPLED. A coconut farm in Limasawa, Southern Leyte ravaged by Typhoon Odette in this Dec. 27, 2021 photo. About 10 million euros in humanitarian assistance will be given by the European Commission t… [+2168 chars]
